workshop.title: Autonomous Data Management Hands-On Workshop
workshop.description: This workshop will show how you can solve data integration and data management challenges typically present in an organization.

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: Autonomous Data Management hands-on Workshop overview

labs.title: Lab 50: Introduction and Provisioning ADW
labs.description: Introduction to the workshop and learn how to provision an ADW instance and connect to it

labs.title: Lab 100: Integrate Relational Data into ADW
labs.description: Instructions to load relational data into ADW

labs.title: Lab 200: Integrate Big Data into ADW
labs.description: Instructions to load data from big data platform to ADW

labs.title: Lab 300: Create External Table in ADW
labs.description: Instructions to create external table in ADW

labs.title: Lab 400: Visualization using Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC)
labs.description: Instructions to create visualization with OAC
